name: Isle Invaders
description:
Protect your island from strange bottle invaders !

You are a little bunny that can shoot carrots to push his enemies in the water. But be careful ! If you touch them too many times, they will die, but a strange and deadly surface will appear !

Protect your island !

Your island is invaded by strange bottles ! It's your job to eliminate them ! There are lots of differents plants on the island. If you do nothing, all these beautiful flowers will disappear forever !

Kill all enemies !

You have to shoot carrots on your enemies to push them in the water, because your projectiles are not very powerful. But be careful ! If you touch them 13 times, they will die... and a strange and deadly surface will appear.

Try to get the best score possible !

There are differents playstyles : you can either wait that the dumb enemies walk straight in the water, or shoot at all the enemies you see. And with his tutorial and his easy controls, anyone can play Isle Invaders !
